text: ثُمَّ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ أَنِ ٱتَّبِعۡ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

translation.en: Then We revealed to you, [O Muhammad], to follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of those who associate with Allah
translation.id: Kemudian Kami wahyukan kepadamu (Muhammad), "Ikutilah agama Ibrahim yang lurus, dan dia bukanlah termasuk orang yang musyrik
